data.title: Glad to have a candy shop in Round Rock
data.text: Great selection, friendly staff, cute shop!  Love that there is a candy shop downtown.  They also serve ice cream and various sodas, etc.

data.title: Cool
data.text: Neat little candy shop with old time candies from back in the day, they are on the expense side though, also different flavored soda pops. Also had ice cream inside.

data.title: A real treat on Main Street
data.text:
3 Star Candy Shop offers bulk & specialty candies, the area's best selection of bottled sodas from around the country, hand-dipped ice cream cones/sundaes, chocolates, and custom-flavor sodas. I've tried many of their hand-made selections and I've always been satisfied!

The shop stocks over 200 bottled sodas (including pretty much the entire line of Sprecher sodas from Wisconsin which are hands-down my favorites). If you don't see what you want, you can choose flavorings to make your own custom soda.

The ice cream is served in ample portions, usually with a cute gummy candy on top. If you splurge for a fancy sundae, be prepared to be in awe. They're nearly works of art.

The shop was remodeled in 2016, adding a walk-up window -- though I'd still go inside to take a better look at everything. There are a few stools outside or you can easily take your treats down to the plaza about a block to the east.

The shop is located right downtown, making it an easy stop for after looking around the other shops or before seeing the bat colony, or as a destination in itself. There's on-street parking plus a free public parking garage that's well-marked.

In terms of candy, they have everything I've ever wanted and more. My kids enjoy picking bulk candy that might only cost a few cents, but it's also a good spot to satisfy your cravings for nostalgic candy. The candy here is also tasteful -- I haven't seen any inappropriate candies (like some candy shops I've visited in other cities sometimes feature). So, it's like most of Round Rock -- family friendly and home style. Definitely recommended.
